original_text: Did you go to see a man who was wearing expensive clothes? No! People like that do not live in the wilderness. They have many beautiful things and they live in great houses.
korean_text: 그러면 너희가 무엇을 보려고 나갔더냐 부드러운 옷 입은 사람이냐 보라 화려한 옷을 입고 사치하게 지내는 자는 왕궁에 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Did you go to see a man

sentences.korean_translation: 비싼 옷을 입고 있는 사람을 말입니다

sentences.original_text: do not live in the wilderness.

sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아름다운 것들을 많이 가지고 있으며

sentences.original_text: and they live in great houses.
